dublin_core.dcvalue: The statistical characteristic is the key to image compression Here we have studied the statistical characteristic of wavelet subimage and designed a new image quantization algorithm referred to statistical characteristics of both wavelet subimage and human visual
Sheng wu yi xue gong cheng xue za zhi = Journal of biomedical engineering = Shengwu yixue gongchengxue zazhi
[The study of a image compression method based on wavelet statistical characteristic].
